thread.title: Man-Cave | Watch: Here's that Vine of Jamie Carragher & Thierry Henry reacting to Brendan Rogers' sacking
thread.title_full: Man-Cave | Watch: Here's that Vine of Jamie Carragher & Thierry Henry reacting to Brendan Rogers' sacking - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: Man-Cave | Watch: Here's that Vine of Jamie Carragher & Thierry Henry reacting to Brendan Rogers' sacking
text:
It's the Vine seen around the world and pretty much summed up everyone's reaction to the news.
Both Thiery Henry and Anfield legend Jamie Carragher were told, live on air, of the news that Brendan Rodgers had left Liverpool following their 1-1 draw with Everton. As you can see, Carragher barely moves whilst Henry seems more shocked.
Expect to see this in a thousand memes from now until the end of the week.
As for Rodgers' replacement, names such as Jurgen Klopp are being bandied about, but there'll undoubtedly be news in the coming hours.
In the meantime, watch this Vine on repeat.
Via Vine
